name: interministerial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving different ministers (= important members of the government): The report proposes setting up an interministerial committee. The interministerial commission is due to present its recommendations on Friday.
More examplesFewer examplesAn inter-ministerial commission has been debating how to deal with future oil revenue.It was announced at an interministerial meeting that the money would become available immediately.She was the chair of an interministerial committee overseeing the economy.The interministerial council was a vital tool for keeping track of his own government.
